item.title: Principles of economics applied to software development, reliability engineering, and technical leadership
item.description: One of my favorite subjects as a lay person is economics from which I have found many useful applications of core principles relating to my work in software development, technical leadership as well as my recent reliability engineering roles. This is a post to share some of my thoughts around this. A few ideas from economics The ideas from economics that have resonated with me at work are: opportunity cost Looking at what you lose by choosing a specific activity over others.
